name: Discovery (itch) (Nathann Latimore)
description:
---
Controls: 
Arrow Keys to Move
Spacebar to Send a Message
Spacebar to skip through textboxes

---
Discovery, created by Nathann Latimore and Harrison Kurtz, is a game about trying to experience all the wonderful little moments that life has to offer before it’s all over and the self-destructive paradox that comes with trying to experience everything at once.

In the vein of classic 2D-space-shooter games, you pilot a ship through an asteroid field, avoiding an expanding supernova. Scattered throughout space are glowing stars that contain moments, memories, and bits of conversation. How many moments can you truly discover and experience before it's all over?

---
This project was created as part of a game design course in Winter 2020
